text:
*Launch Potato is hiring a Marketing Copywriter* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

As a Marketing Copywriter at FinanceBuzz, you'll be writing snappy, goal-driven copy that will be seen by over 2 million readers daily across various platforms. While our headquarters is in vibrant downtown Delray Beach, Florida, we have a unique, international team distributed across several countries and are a pioneering advocate of remote work.

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/3sNDPyA>

<@U01HDKN2G4B>
